text: Noorderhaaks or Razende Bol is an uninhabited small island of the province of North Holland, the Netherlands. It belongs to the municipality of Texel. It covers an area of 4 kmÂ². Noorderhaaks makes part of the West Frisian Islands (Dutch: Waddeneilanden). It is the most western island. It lies southwest of the island of Texel. Category:West Frisian Islands Category:Texel
title: Noorderhaaks
